# Security Policy

## Reporting Security Issues

If you discover a security vulnerability in this repository, please report it privately by creating a private vulnerability report or emailing <helgelb@hotmail.com>.

**Do not** report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.

**Note:** For general bugs or feature requests, use the regular [Issues](../../issues) page instead.

## Response Time

I'll do my best but don't expect rapid fixes. No SLAs, just good intentions.
